trans-unit.source: Represents a panel that dynamically lays out its contents horizontally or vertically.
trans-unit.target: 代表透過水平或垂直方式動態配置其內容的面板。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> control arranges its contents in a horizontal or vertical flow direction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> 控制項會以水平或垂直的流動方向來排列其內容。

trans-unit.source: Its contents can be wrapped from one row to the next, or from one column to the next.
trans-unit.target: 其內容可以從某一資料列換行至下一個資料列，或從某一資料行換行至下一個資料行。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, its contents can be clipped instead of wrapped.
trans-unit.target: 或者，裁剪其內容，而不是包裝。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the flow direction by setting the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel.FlowDirection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel.FlowDirection%2A> 屬性的值來指定文字方向。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> control correctly reverses its flow direction in right-to-left (RTL) layouts.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>控制項正確地反轉其方向由右至左 (RTL) 配置中的。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify whether the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> control are wrapped or clipped by setting the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel.WrapContents%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定是否內容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>控制要包裝或裁剪的值設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel.WrapContents%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Any Windows Forms control, including other instances of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>, can be a child of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 任何 Windows Form 控制項，包括的其他執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>，可以是子系<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: With this capability, you can construct sophisticated layouts that adapt to your form's dimensions at run time.
trans-unit.target: 使用這項功能，您可以建構複雜的配置，以在執行階段調整為表單的維度。

trans-unit.source: Docking and anchoring behaviors of child controls differ from the behaviors in other container controls.
trans-unit.target: 子控制項的停駐和錨定行為，和其他容器控制項的行為不一樣。

trans-unit.source: Both docking and anchoring are relative to the largest control in the flow direction.
trans-unit.target: 停駐和錨定是相對於文字方向中的最大控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Anchor and Dock Child Controls in a FlowLayoutPanel Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-anchor-and-dock-child-controls-in-a-flowlayoutpanel-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 錨定和停駐 FlowLayoutPanel 控制項中的子控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-anchor-and-dock-child-controls-in-a-flowlayoutpanel-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel.FlowDirection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel.WrapContents%2A> properties on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel.FlowDirection%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel.WrapContents%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into the Form1 source file.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼貼入 Form1 原始程式檔。

trans-unit.source: If your project contains a file named Form1.Designer.cs or Form1.Designer.vb, remove that file from the project.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的專案包含名為 Form1.Designer.cs 或 Form1.Designer.vb 檔案，請從專案移除該檔案。

trans-unit.source: You may need to click the **Show All Files** button in Solution Explorer to see the designer file.
trans-unit.target: 您可能需要按一下**顯示所有檔案**方案總管，請參閱 < 設計工具的檔案中的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel.FlowDirection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel.WrapContents%2A> properties to their default values: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowDirection.LeftToRight> and `true`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel.FlowDirection%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel.WrapContents%2A>成為其預設值的屬性：<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowDirection.LeftToRight>和`true`分別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the flow direction of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel" /> 控制項的流向。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlowDirection" /> values indicating the direction of consecutive placement of controls in the panel.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlowDirection" /> 值，表示面板上的控制項連續位置的方向。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.FlowDirection.LeftToRight" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.FlowDirection.LeftToRight" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel.FlowDirection%2A> property is the default property for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel.FlowDirection%2A>屬性是預設屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel.FlowDirection%2A> depending on the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel.FlowDirection%2A>根據所選<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>。

trans-unit.source: The child control.
trans-unit.target: 子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that represents the flow-break setting of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel" /> 控制項的流程中斷設定。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the flow break is set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已設定流程中斷，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a cached instance of the panel's layout engine.
trans-unit.target: 取得面板配置引擎的快取執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> for the panel's contents.
trans-unit.target: 面板內容的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" />。

trans-unit.source: The child control.
trans-unit.target: 子控制項。

trans-unit.source: The flow-break value to set.
trans-unit.target: 要設定的流程中斷值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value that represents the flow-break setting of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 設定值，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel" /> 控制項的流程中斷設定。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to receive the extender properties.
trans-unit.target: 接收擴充項屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider.CanExtend(System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider.CanExtend(System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this object can provide extender properties to the specified object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個物件能夠提供擴充項屬性給指定的物件則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel" /> control should wrap its contents or let the contents be clipped.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel" /> 控制項是應該將其內容換行還是裁剪內容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the contents should be wrapped; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該將內容換行，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If the area of the panel is too small to contain all its child controls, at least one child control will be clipped regardless of the wrapping mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果太小，無法包含其所有子控制項的面板的區域，至少一個子控制項會裁剪不論文繞圖模式。

trans-unit.source: Subsequent resizing of the panel will reapply the layout to the contained controls.
trans-unit.target: 後續調整面板的大小會重新配置套用至包含的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel.WrapContents%2A> property depending on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A> value of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel.WrapContents%2A>屬性取決於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Checked%2A>值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>控制項。
